entry.title: You Got Me Hot, I'm Soaked
entry.summary:
Author: nursal1060

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,410Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 16

Summary: It’s the first summer since Dick took up the cowl, and tensions are rising amongst the boys that he helped raise - Jason’s always angry, Tim’s burnt out, and Damian has been…testing his boundaries.Dick works to soothe each one of their pains, relying on their bodies and each of their needs to help all of them calm down, and they return the favor for him. Maybe all they need is each other.BatShip Summer: Batman/Robin (Summer/”It's Okay”/Age Gap/Daddy Kink)
